recipeList.directions: 1. Place the potatoes in a pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat. 2. Once boiling, reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender. 3. Drain and cool. Once cool enough to handle, cube the potatoes into small cubes. 4. In a large bowl, combine the cubed potatoes, onion, mayonnaise, garlic powder, salt and pepper. 5. Stir until everything is evenly coated. 6. Refrigerate for at least an hour before serving to let the flavors come together.
recipeList.ingredients: Potatoes (2), Onion (1), Mayonnaise (1/2 cup), Garlic Powder (1 teaspoon), Salt (2 teaspoons), Pepper (1/4 teaspoon)

recipeList.directions:
1. Peel and dice potatoes.
2. Heat butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Cook diced potatoes and onion in skillet until potato is tender, stirring occasionally.
4. Whisk the eggs in a medium bowl and add salt and pepper.
5. Reduce heat to low and pour in egg mixture.
6. Add potatoes and onion and sprinkle with cheese.
7. Cook until eggs are set, approximately 5 minutes.
8. Flip omelette and cook additional 2 minutes.
9. Cut omelette in fourths and serve.
recipeList.ingredients: Potatoes (2), eggs (4), butter (4 tbsp), onion (1), cheese (2 oz), salt (2 tsp), pepper (1/2 tsp)
